ygData.subject: Re: ALL spells currently in game....
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all, this is starting to get a BIT off topic.  Other than that I will answer your question. Well, I searched through the game files for any info on
ygData.messageBody:
First of all, this is starting to get a BIT off topic. Other than that I
will answer your question.

Well, I searched through the game files for any info on the equipment in
the game and couldn't find any at all. I will try again sometime soon, but
it didn't look very promising. As for decoding the layout of the zones, it
is my believe that the actual structure of the zones is downloaded to your
computer as you zone, and only the graphics and physics model are actually
stored locally.

chpicker
Minister of Commerce, OCD
Veeshan
